title: How to view a full list of Retweets from someone else's post on Twitter - Quora

response.answer_text: Another thing I learned being a bit of a sweatbag and creating an infinite retweet macro , When utilizing the SMS system to keep recreating accounts the SMS ones you create burn the second you send the stop command to the Twitter SMS short number (typically 40404) So if you see someone with like 1000 retweets but can’t seem to see but about 20 or 30 of em… Might be someone juicing the social signals a bit hah!

By the following steps you can see the retweets of someone else’s post on Twitter: But there will be no specific list of it you have to do scrolling for the retweets 1 : open your account 2 : go to the search option 3 : search for the person and then you will be directed to the searched account and there you can see it. Best Wishes.
